Class Mine

                    +--eecs.jago.instructor.flowers.Mine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Destructible, java.lang.Runnable, Visible
public class Mine
extends SolidElement
implements Destructible

A mine that will be removed only by a DozerBot. It will destroy all other Destructible elements that collide with it. When hit by a DozerBot, it is destroyed, and removed from the simulation.

handleCollision

public void handleCollision(Collidable element)
Reacts to a collision. If colliding with a DozerBot, the mine will explode and then be removed from the simulation; otherwise, it will destroy any Destructible element that collides with it, then it will destroy itself.

Specified by:
handleCollision in interface Collidable
